title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Cognitive Psychology-Based e-Learning Strategy Development and Policy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more strategies applicable to e-learning content design by analyzing cognitive psychology theories
Learners can structure an e-learning policy framework based on multimodal learning principles tailored to institutional environments
Learners can establish action plans to dynamically improve e-learning strategies as a process using a policy-execution-evaluation linkage model
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
